website_summaries.verdict: The best budget cake pop maker with an eye on making baking friendly for kids.
pros: Cake pop molds are shaped as Mickey Mouse, making the treats fun to make and eat for kids
Kit includes piping bag and cake pop sticks for repeated use
Stays still thanks to non-skid rubber feet
cons: Small cake pop molds can only fit four cake pops at a time
Cake pops prone to cracks and breaking

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. Very cute. Not round, but not flat like some of the reviews have mentioned. You have to use the recipe in the manual to achieve the fuller Mickey head
customer_reviews.author: mamasanlzn

customer_reviews.title: Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Made Minnie Mouse cake pops as soon as received. It came with the sticks, piping bag to fill the pan, and instructions with recipe. Took few practices get good pops. I found the piping bag & tip supplied made batter come out to quickly so was overfilling. I suggest using a piping bag with end clipped or large freezer bag with corner end clipped for greater control. I used a cake mix so maybe recipe batter is thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like how It's all an estimate as to exactly how ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!! I don't like how It's all an estimate as to exactly how much to fill and how long to leave them -but with play you can find what works. I used a regular cake mix and filled just to even and let them cook for 5 min. They were never really rounded or plumped up and I did mess with different times and fill levels , so they're more flat then round but they're still Adorable and not over cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mendes Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pops are pretty flat
customer_reviews.text: This does not make great cake pops, however, it would make a great mini pancake maker! The pops are pretty flat which was the disappointing part.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cake pops!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this cake pop maker today. I'm hoping it doesn't start fire like one of the other reviewers said theirs did, but so far so good! I want to jump up and down and post pictures of Pinterest about how I, yes I created perfect little mouse shaped cake pops with this fantastic little gadget! My 3-year-old is going to be so excited when she sees these little sweeties at her birthday party! Worked great, they cook fast, and come out clean. Perfect little mouse head :) I made them pink so we have Minnie cake pops instead of Mickey!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: However if you fill it with the correct amount then you will get perfect heads.
customer_reviews.text: You have to fill the cavities with the right amount of cake or else they do not come out as they are supposed too. Too little gets you skinny spaced apart ears and too much explodes or makes misshaped mickey mouse heads. However if you fill it with the correct amount then you will get perfect heads.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean, in love <3
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE THISSSSS <3. I didn’t use the recipe in the book, I used my home recipe for cupcake batter. If you leave them long, they get crispy at the ends!!!! And i didnt get the cake pop shape, I got them more like a really fluffy pancake IT WAS GREAT STILL But it is very easy to use :)) and clean !!!! In love. Inner child was having the best day ever!!! 😂❤️
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy but watch out
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know I will recommend it to my friends or not. First, it’s cute shape which my kids love it. Second, it’s flavor is better than the waffle machine I bought. More crunchy. Third, it’s easy to operate and never burn out. However, you should be careful when you want to open it, it will pop out with some hot liquid sometimes. I was little scalding for twice after I used for one month.
customer_reviews.author: Chi-wei Kung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little mm heads.
customer_reviews.text: Received and used. It heated up quick and made little perfect Mickey Mouse heads. They cooked very fast and were easy to pull out. However, I don’t know how to place the sticks. I tried with one stick and I couldn’t place where it would close to bake/cook. I ended up having to heads on one stick. I’ll continue to work with it but besides that it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Flat cake pops! Awful product
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept...does not look like the finished product in the photos lol. If you look very closely at the photo with the cake pops inside the maker, you'll see just how flat the cake pops are. I couldn't even add 2 cake pops together to make 1 round cake pop. Waste of money and time! I would not recommend this to anyone. Disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make good cake pops
customer_reviews.text: Makes horrible cake pops. First of all they come out to flat so you can barely put a stick in. The bag it comes with to fill the Chambers with batter is extremely cheap and broke on my in the middle of filling it with batter and the batter went everywhere. I would rather spend the extra time and make them myself
customer_reviews.author: Rozenda Bird

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and the cake pops come out perfectly. I even made mickey mouse shaped pancakes for my son. he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory and Keli

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying two!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up better than the regular cake pop maker. Wish it made more. Quick to use just this one than both at the same time cause the other one sticks so bad. We like it so much we may buy another to have two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered wrong product but love it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I completely messed up and ordered this based on the color. I was looking at the Mickey waffle iron in black and clicked the red thinking it was the same item. Its not. this is a cake pop machine just like it says.... it's super cute and the mickey heads really do look like mickey!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the little Mickey cake pops...Can't go wrong with this purchase especially if you are a Disney fan!! Easy to use and cake pops come out perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Queenkima

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for birthday parties!
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice in a two month period for both my son and daughter’s birthday parties. Used regular cake mix with not as much water and they came out perfect. They remind me of funnel cake....like fried cake batter. Good tho!
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Flat pops
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I was going to make some cute Mickey Mouse cake pops for my sons first birthday and I was disappointed:( they come with cake pop sticks which was cool but my cake pops were flat no matter how much batter I poured. It tells you not to overflow the batter but even if you do they don't come out like the picture at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use. Low quality. No cake pops.
customer_reviews.text: If you like to make cake pops at an incredible slow pace and have them come out raw in the middle, this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Not round enough
customer_reviews.text: This "cake pop maker" did not make cake pops! The result was what looked like mickey mouse pancakes. Was not spherical at all. The idea is nice, but just didn't result in what we were looking for. They fell apart easily too, which would make decorating almost impossible. Amazon made the return process a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: A. Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Small cakepop Mickey Mouse head
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give it 1 star is because the Mickey house heads are so small. It’s smaller than the average cakepop size. So when you eat it it doesn’t taste like much. Easy to clean, super portable , and durable. Very small and doesn’t take up a lot of counter space
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and cute
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Use the recipe that comes with it though.. works best.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it to make pancakes. So cute, easy, and fast! Little one was so excited to eat mickey mouse pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: stefie sky

customer_reviews.title: Disney cake pop maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Disney product makes great cake pops
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Shapes came out perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My Mickey Mouse shapes came out perfectly, just don't overfill the wells. My cake pops held onto the stick when I dipped them. I was worried they may be too heavy
customer_reviews.author: rmendi

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great recipe and great product overall. The piping bag was not great it popped after a few of them but it was fine because I had more on hand. I also didn’t like the piping tip I used a larger one to put more batter in there faster.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: cute cake pops
customer_reviews.text: time consuming to make because you can only make 4 at a time. they are rather thin/flat compared to other cake pop makers. I used a piping bag to fill and it only took about 5 minutes to bake. I hand dipped and laid it flat instead of using a stick. Kids loved it, it is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie T

customer_reviews.title: cute little baker.
customer_reviews.text: makes good little cakes, bit of a pain to clean but other than that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Oldershaw

customer_reviews.title: it's smelling
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but it's way to smelling when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute & beautiful. And works well. I love my Cake Pop Maker! <3
customer_reviews.author: MujdeOz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Omg I just love it. My kitchen is about mickey mouse 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Carmona

customer_reviews.title: so cute i love it!
customer_reviews.text: i love it so much it was really easy to use and so cute it also came with cake pop sticks which was a life saver it was easy to clean and came in the mail early can't say one bad thing about it
customer_reviews.author: john williams

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get full round cake.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get a "full" circle of cake. Does not seal properly and cake seeps out instead of filling top cavity.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Instructions aren’t clear
customer_reviews.text: The pops didn’t come out so great. The instructions do not indicate how much cake mix is supposed to go into the cake pop maker .
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTYNAH Pierre

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: Use this to make all sorts of food, cake pops, pan cakes, frittata For my 2 year old grandson. It’s Mickey and he loves it. Easy to use and clean. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Muffkinsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Cake pops made quickly and looked just like mickeys silhouette
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Plates didn't heat up, returned it bc it's broken. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ac481

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy with taste. Tried all brands and it has a bland taste.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie337

customer_reviews.title: the cake batter ends up more like a fatter pancake
customer_reviews.text: ummm.... it should be called a fat pancake maker.... It doesn't make cake pops, the cake batter ends up more like a fatter pancake.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use Clean up is a breeze Not to big so easy storage And comes with a good amount of sticks
customer_reviews.author: Alexander medina

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this item. It says cake pop maker. It's more like a pancake maker. Mikey is very flat like a pancake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It’s not exactly round. It’s more like a slight puff. I’ve used it for cakes and pancakes. I’m certain anything that needs baking is good for it.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but wish it made more at a time
customer_reviews.text: My only critique is that I wish it was bigger. Can only make four at a time. They cook quick but repeating the process over and over to use all the batter takes forever.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Drzata

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They come out very cute but the ears got too heavy and would break off when dipped.
customer_reviews.author: verenice rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm fall in love with the mickey mouse cake pop , works good !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mickey Cake pops, gotta love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. It can make cake pops within in minutes. Very easy to do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the cake pop maker! It was so quick and easy to use! I made 100 cake pops for my daughters first birthday! It didn’t take a lot of time and the cake pops were a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's cute but flat cakes aren't..
customer_reviews.text: They were really flat. No measurement instructions. Cute concept but not what i expected
customer_reviews.author: perla Marcial

customer_reviews.title: Cook
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use it for my daughters bday party
customer_reviews.author: Claudia arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This machine is not that great and cake pops come out kind of small
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Only used once but was amazing the cake pop came out so good.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Mercao

customer_reviews.title: Taste and presentation
customer_reviews.text: Super small cake pops! Not worth all that effort and time. But, they are cute .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Fun family time!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and clean. Great treat makerwith the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever
customer_reviews.text: Like the way my Mickey Mouse cake pops turned out
customer_reviews.author: sonia vargas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this cake pop marker! It is easy to use. It takes a few times to get the amount of batter right, but then it's super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Torres

customer_reviews.title: It's cute and cooks well but can't use it for my daughters bday like I had ordered it
customer_reviews.text: Cake pops come out a lot more flat than round. It's cute and cooks well but can't use it for my daughters bday like I had ordered it for
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After one set of cake pops the cake pop maker exploded and caught on fire.
customer_reviews.author: febe

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Made two batches so far. Lots of work, but lots of fun. Dipping into red candy melts and chocolate melts was a lot of work and pretty stressful. Highly recommend buying the 99 cent package of cake mix that is red or dyeing your own and only dipping the ears.
customer_reviews.author: bwhite

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Head of pops was a lot skinnier than I would have liked
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied at
customer_reviews.text: Makes only 4 at a time not 8. Not as expected. Not satisfied at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake Pops
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I missed up the first 2 attempts until I figured out a good filling amount that wouldnt overflow. I used a Duncan Heinz Swiss Chocolate cake mix as directed and added 1 small box dry instant chocolate pudding mix to the cake batter... I used a piping bag to quickly and easily refill. Remove them carefully and allow to cool completely before inserting sticks and dipping. They were moist and delicious. Huge hit. This batch with 1 cake mix made approx 60 cake pops. They come out prettier/smoother finish if you coat them with your candy melts twice.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Love this little machine!
customer_reviews.text: What a cute little machine. It makes four pops at a time, and they only take about 3 minutes to bake. It comes with all you need to start popping: machine, a piping bag fitted with a tip to pour the batter in, and pop sticks. The pops are kind of small, but just eat two instead of one!!! So much fun! I made a bouquet for my son's teacher as my first project! After baking, I just removed any of the extra by cutting it away. Perfect little Mickeys and Minnies.
customer_reviews.author: Vianney Luna

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket for the wee ones
customer_reviews.text: I personally have not tried it but my six-year-old grandson loves it so I am giving it 5 stars because it has been kid tested and heartily approved and I got bonus points with the little man {:>)
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: This does not really work to make cake pops! It makes a pretty flat mouse head. It's really hard to figure out the correct amount to use to make them a little bit fuller because if you go over by even a little bit it makes a huge mess! If you have hours and a ton of time to figure out how to make it perfectly go ahead if not don't buy it it's not worth the headache!
customer_reviews.author: Ashely Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I never made cake pops before but this makes it very very easy!! Easy clean up too.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cake pop maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this cake pop maker. I use it to make little mickey mouse pancakes as well, although if you use pancake mix they wont be as round as the cake ones but they do the trick and my toddler loves them.
customer_reviews.author: GN

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Okay so originally I posted a review that wasn’t so nice because the product I received was broken. The same day that I sent a complaint, a new product was sent out. The new product was brand new and pretty easy to use. I love that they didn’t argue with me and just sent me a new item. It is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Decker

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Real simple. Easy peasy. Make cake pops or just pour simple pancake batter in them and eat Mickey Mouse shaped pancake dipper. Yum and fun for my kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Mudbox

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son’s first birthday coming up which is Mickey themed. The cake pops come out pretty small like bite size and it can be messy but very easy to use and clean. Makes a lot with one mixture of boxed cake!
customer_reviews.author: GonzAJ09

customer_reviews.title: Mickey cake pops? Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit that the first batch were less than perfect and then the second batch was not quite there, but after the third try, I had this thing down and they came out great! They were a hit at my sons Mickey party. Be patient and watch for the light to tell you when it is done!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun and cute
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed baking with this. My 5 and 6 year old love mickey and had a blast baking mickey mouse cake pops with me
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, couldn't get the cake pops to turn out right
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it was user error, but the cake pops that came out of this looked like Pinterest fail pictures. They were flat, not round, I couldn't get the Mickey head to be spherical no matter what I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: I tried many different cake recipes and nothing rises enough to make it look like a cake pop
customer_reviews.text: So this product does not actually make cake pops. I tried many different cake recipes and nothing rises enough to make it look like a cake pop. Very disappointed as I was trying to make cake pops for my kids birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Stav Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This works more like a waffle iron. Despite following recipes, cake pops turned out more like waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Dana Buttlar

customer_reviews.title: I'm a good cook.
customer_reviews.text: They either came out burned or severely undercooked. I'm a good cook... so i don't think it's from lack of ability. I ended up tossing it the day after getting it. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Gower

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well but you have to let the cake get darker, like brown but not burnt otherwise the insides stay undercooked.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so super easy to use. I used a squeeze bottle to fill the cake batter. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: tinchix

customer_reviews.title: Mickey mouse
customer_reviews.text: Love it I comes out perfect and fast very cute for kids breakfast or party
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s small
customer_reviews.text: Very good to use, but Mickey's face Is stickiness and need more time to work. I use Pancake recipe
customer_reviews.author: A-Ma

customer_reviews.title: Love  the product
customer_reviews.text: OMG, it's a go! I just love this product. My daughter just had a Mickey mouse bday. And the pops are awesome and cute.
customer_reviews.author: SUGAH

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My son and his friend love it! It's easy to make Mickey pop cake. Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: How many cake pops does it make?
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as making 9 cake pops- it only makes 4
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these, one for myself and one as a gift. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really excited to break this thing out and make some cake pops!
customer_reviews.author: Kcollins0608

customer_reviews.title: Flat Mickey Heads
customer_reviews.text: I,too,got flat cake pops. The idea of this cake pop maker is great but the execution not so much. I tried cake batter for my first attempt. I read that another reviewer used pancake batter so I'll try that next. Hopefully that will give me round pops.
customer_reviews.author: Chun Lee

product_meta.title: Disney Cake Pop Maker, One Size, Red
product_meta.description: Makes 4 Mickey Mouse shaped cake pops. Cake Pop maker has Power Light, Latching Handle, Convenient Cord Wrap and Non-Skid Rubber Feet for safe and easy baking. Also includes 25 Cake Pop sticks and a Batter Piping Bag to easily fill each reservoir.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars358 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars

categories: Electric Cake Pop & Mini Cake Makers
